snippet.title: Rebots - Official Gameplay Video w/ developer commentary | Guerilla Collective 2024
snippet.description:
Rebots is a first-person resource management game about running jobs for picky aliens. As Rebots Corp’s newest agent, it’s your task to journey to diverse asteroids, terraform the land, gather resources through bot automation, and fulfill client's needs. And who knows, maybe you’ll get a raise!

Check out a more in-depth overview of Rebots from Regő Porkoláb, the Production Director at FlatPonies! Regő will take you through a late-game mission in Rebots focusing on building a solar plant on an asteroid.

Rebots Website: rebotsgame.com

Check out all Astra Logical games:
⟁astralogical.org

#resourcemanagementgame #automationgame #flatponies #astralogical #PCgames #games #gaming
